title: Multiselect doesn't work properly on the model list

content.raw:
Holding `Ctrl` to multiselect in the scene works:

1. Insert 2 models in the scene

1. Click on one of them, then click on the other holding `Ctrl`

1. Both visuals are highlighted in the scene and in the left panel

But multiselect on the left panel doesn't work well:

1. Insert 2 models in the scene

1. Click on the name of one of them in the scene - it gets highlighted in the scene and on the panel

1. Holding `Ctrl`, click on the name of the second one: it gets highlighted in the scene but not on the panel
content.html:

  2. Click on the name of one of them in the scene - it gets highlighted in the scene and on the panel

  3. Holding Ctrl, click on the name of the second one: it gets highlighted in the scene but not on the panel
